Color Refinement

Posted on October 10, 2024 by Yu Cong
Tags: alg

There is nothing new in this post. I found this problem while searching for methods for reducing the dimension of LPs. I read this wikipedia page and was surprised that this can be done in O((n+m)logn) time.

The algorithm is described in [1].

1 Definition

I think the demonstration in [1] is excellent so there is no need for a blog post. The first 3 sections answered everything I wondered while reading the wikipedia page,

  • are these definitions equivalent? Basic Lemma 1
  • what’s the intuition? Section 2. The partitioning algorithm
  • …

References

[1]
A. Cardon, M. Crochemore, Partitioning a graph in O(AlogV), Theoretical Computer Science. 19 (1982) 85–98 10.1016/0304-3975(82)90016-0.
